articles.description: A leaked document has affirmed that OnePlus is becoming an OPPO subbrand, and it has also aroused fears about the future of OyxgenOS.
articles.content: OnePlus is becoming an OPPO subbrand, according to a newly leaked document of internal “talking points”. The document was leaked by Evan Blass of @evleaks fame after OnePlus announced that it was “fu… [+2976 chars]
